title: HD Tune Pro v4.61 (en)
description:
HD Tune Pro is an extended version of HD Tune which includes many new features such as: write benchmark, secure erasing, AAM setting, folder usage view, disk monitor, command line parameters and file benchmark.

HD Tune Pro is a hard disk utility which has the following functions:

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â» Error Scan: scans the surface for errors

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â» Disk Monitor: monitors disk access 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â» Folder View: shows disk space usage for each folder 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â» AAM: reduces noise or increases seek performance 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â» Temperature display

OS: Windows 2000/XP/Vista/7
Home Page: www.hdtune.com
Interface: English
